sentences.en: Our clavichord is kept in the living - room.
sentences.cn: 我们的古钢琴安放在起居室里.

sentences.en: Our clavichord is kept in the living room.
sentences.cn: 我们的击弦古钢琴是放在起居室里的.

sentences.en: That's why she wanted to play the clavichord.
sentences.cn: 这就是她想弹古钢琴的原因。

sentences.en: The clavichord which my grandfather bought years ago was damaged.
sentences.cn: 我祖父多年前买的古钢琴被损坏了.

sentences.en: We have an all ( old ) musical instrument, it's a clap record ( Clavichord ) .
sentences.cn: 我们拥有一件古老的乐器, 它叫做翼 琴.

sentences.en: We have an old musical instrument. It is called a clavichord.
sentences.cn: 我们有一件古老的乐器. 它叫击弦古钢琴.

trans.tran_en: a musical instrument like a piano, that was played especially in the past
